channel.title: Genrative AI on Niels Berglund

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 09, 2025
item.description:
AI is pushing boundaries once again! This week, we explore a multi-agent system automating PC tasks, OpenAI’s reasoning models vs GPT workflows, and a next-gen research AI outshining Google.

Plus, we dive into LLM customisation, AI’s evolving role in engineering, and the arrival of GPT-4.5. Finally, the Call for Speakers for Data & AI Community Day Durban: AI @ Ignite++ is liveâ€”registrations open today, so don’t miss out! ðŸš€
